question: What is the main objective of the Drop Back Assistance launched in Odisha?
option1: Free healthcare service for those who visit any Govt. Hospital
option2: Rs 500 for pregnant women and sick infants who visits public health facilities
option3: Free health insurance scheme for journalists
answer: Rs 500 for pregnant women and sick infants who visits public health facilities
explanation: Drop Back Assistance was launched in the year 2018. Rs 500 will be provided to pregnant women and sick infants who visit public health facilities as planned in the Drop Back Assistance launched in Odisha.
